name: Mick and Dens
tagline: House Clearance Services in Leicestershire, we have over 35 years experience.
body:
### House Clearance Services in Leicestershire
If you are moving house and to dispose of your old furniture, wanting to sell some of your possessions or you are looking for a complete house clearance service, then Mick & Dens are here to help.

### We have over 35 years experience

Whether you are looking to clear a full house, part of a house, a garage or loft we can help. There are many cases where you may want to use house clearance services such as the distribution of an estate or downsizing and rest assured that we provide a conscientious and efficient service. From the removal of furniture to the distribution of personal effects and belongings, we offer a full range of services.

We can even arrange for items to be delivered to family members.

Bereavement clearances can be heart breaking, time consuming, costly and hard work. Mick & Dens friendly professional approach means every job will be done efficiently and professionally. 

We guarantee to make difficult and emotional situations as easy as possible.

For more information about house clearances in Leicester please call us on: 0116 2338828

or email us: mick@mickanddens.co.uk

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
